name: Jumping Sam III
description:
Jumping Sam III is a classic platformer game. 

Jump through exciting platforms, avoid animals and reach the top in time.

Get thrilling experience of jumping.

Enjoy a challenging adventure!

JUMPING SAM III FEATURES ARE-
- Easy intuitive gameplay.
- Challenging levels.
- Avoid collisions with enemies.
- Collect lots of gold coins.
- Amazing graphics.
- Reach the top in time.

Instructions to play: 

Left and Right to move the character.

Enter to Pause and to Un-Pause the game.
